short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block distracting websites to maximise your productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Productivity

“Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort.”

Ensure you are productive on the web. Don't fall into the trap of browsing distracting websites purely out of habit. Productivity helps you maintain conscious web usage!

Features:
- Toggle on/off concentration mode
- Add distracting sites to a blocklist
- Notifications when a distracting site is closed
